definition: same as 渤海[Bo2 Hai3], Bohai Sea between Liaoning and Shandong/Gulf of Zhili or Chihli
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
Bohai Economic Rim (economic region including Beijing, Tianjin, Hebei, Liaoning and Shandong)
pinyin: Huan2 Bo2 hai3 Wan1 Di4 qu1

sentences.english: The slope belts of rifted lacustrine basin in Bohai Bay Basin are very important for hydrocarbon accumulation.
sentences.chinese: 渤海灣盆地斷陷湖盆的斜坡帶是油氣聚集的重要場所。

sentences.english: Tianjin is a major trade center with connection to seaports on the Bohai Gulf.
sentences.chinese: 天津坐擁渤海灣的海港，是主要的貿易中心。

sentences.english: Bohaiwan basin features the alter nations of thinning and thickening of lithospherical mantle.
sentences.chinese: 渤海灣盆地則以岩石圈地幔減薄與增厚波動爲特徵。

sentences.english: Zhuanghai district is located in the south of neritic area in Bohai gulf.
sentences.chinese: 摘要樁海地區位於濟陽坳陷渤海灣南部極淺海地區。

sentences.english: The waters of eastern Bohai Straits is the only route for vessels entering or leaving Bohai Sea Gulf.
sentences.chinese: 渤海海峽以東海域是船舶進出渤海灣的必經之路。

sentences.english: The Bohai oil province is a part of the Bohai bay nonmarine rift basin.
sentences.chinese: 渤海油區是渤海灣陸相裂谷盆地的一部分。

sentences.english: Tanggu is a shining pearl over the Bohai Bay.
sentences.chinese: 塘沽是渤海灣上的一顆璀璨的明珠。

sentences.english: The dinoflagellates abundance is high in the northern Bohai Gulf.
sentences.chinese: 浮游甲藻在渤海灣北部存在高值區。

sentences.english: Multistage reservoir? forming of complex fault blocks is a major feature of petroleum geology in Bohaiwan basin.
sentences.chinese: 複雜斷塊多期成藏是渤海灣盆地石油地質的一大特點。

sentences.english: You'll enjoy the special Sea-food of Bohai Bay.
sentences.chinese: 渤海灣特有的海鮮更是讓您一飽口福。

sentences.english: Haixing lies on the coast of the Bohai Sea.
Colorful sea water on the stony beach of Rizhao, Shandong, PRC.
sentences.chinese: 渤海灣多彩的海水，山東日照。
